data.text: @melakatweets @TheRoot It's not the product.  It is the timing and the name of the product that I find suspect. It is a publicity stunt designed to make a buck at her expense in advance of the most important day of her life.  I see through it and you should too. He's not paying her a compliment.
@pbrad22 @TheRoot Would you say the same if it was a wine vintage?
@pbrad22 @TheRoot Why? It’s just a product. Not unholy evil bad weed from Satan.i thought it was cute. Doesn’t take anything away from her.
@TheRoot Well she still identify as being a black woman

@TheRoot This looks like a hostile move by a family member to try to take advantage of Meghan's good fortune & happiness.  She has broad shoulders & can handle things thrown at her from left field.  Jealous family members can be very destructive.
He's not trying to honor her.
@TheRoot I keep saying it, but her white family is trash.🔥
